name: Dynasty Aviation
about: Dynasty Aviation, located at North Perry Airport in Hollywood, Florida, is a flight school operated by four passionate and professional certified flight instructors. Founded by individuals who once shared the dream of becoming pilots, the school understands the importance of quality instruction and modern equipment. Dynasty Aviation utilizes the latest 2021 and 2022 Sling airplanes equipped with Garmin G3X touchscreen avionics and autopilot functionality, ensuring students are well-prepared for the future of aviation. The school offers a range of courses, including Sport & Private Pilot, Instrument, Commercial Pilot, Multi-Engine, and Flight Instructor certifications, all with flexible financing options and no upfront payments. With a focus on one-on-one instruction and modern technology, Dynasty Aviation provides a positive and rewarding learning experience, preparing students for careers in aviation through partnerships with various airline cadet programs.
